abstract: Rory McIlroy takes third-round lead at Dubai Desert Classic golf tournament.
lead_paragraph: McIlroy extended his lead to four shots with a 6-under 66 on Saturday in the third round of the Dubai Desert Classic in the United Arab Emirates.

headline.main: Rory McIlroy Widens Lead in Dubai

snippet: McIlroy extended his lead to four shots with a 6-under 66 on Saturday in the third round of the Dubai Desert Classic in the United Arab Emirates.
